Name: Cold House
About the game: Cold House is a first-person horror game that is the first episode of three. You have to survive in extreme cold conditions, solve puzzles and unravel the mystery of the cold house. The action takes place in Yakutia, where in winter the air temperature drops below -50 degrees Celsius (-58 F). The main character gets into a car accident and is forced to take refuge from the cold in an abandoned house, waiting for warmer weather, where it will soon turn out that he is not alone at all..
